description: Fix a few spots in the solo based on Jakes YouTube playthrough
title: It's Only Smiles

description: Alright, pretty much every change made since my revision is wrong, the bass drum lands on the down beat, nothing needed to be moved Jake, and your clean chords weren't actually in the right place either. Jacob, I don't even know what you're doing, simplifying the bass part? It was right before, I tabbed it from the stems and to be honest as a bassist myself I'm a little bit offended by your desire to make my part even easier. I'll post another revision later to fix up everything else, but this is just basically my revision from way back when.
title: It's Only Smiles

description: Fixed a few of the rhythm guitar parts. Added clean chords in the verse, after the guitar solo, and before the outro. Redid synth parts.
title: It's Only Smiles

description: Moved everything back by an eighth note as the drums were not landing on the down beats before
title: It's Only Smiles

description: Added drums and bass, and partial keys, and fixed 7/8 section to actually be in 7/8. Also fixed sweep in solo.
title: It's Only Smiles
